sense.def: Alternative Names lao xue 老血 , old blood;

① Alternative Names liu xue 留血 , residual blood; chen xue 陳血 , aged blood. Etiological Agent. of yu xue 瘀血② , stagnant blood, forming long-term accumulations in the body that are difficult to dissolve and may in turn cause further diseases. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 42: 過年不 產，由挾寒冷宿血在胞而有胎，則冷血相搏，令胎不長，產不以時 , “She [was pregnant and] did not give birth for more than a year. The reason is that she had cold and residual blood in her womb together with the fetus. As a result,the cold and the blood struck each other. This prevented the growth of the fetus, and delayed delivery beyond the appropriate time”.
② Pathological Condition brought forth by residual blood. Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 Substance Entry shan hu 珊瑚：主宿血，去 目中翳 , “It controls residual blood and removes shades from within the eyes”.
